It also use low dosage food-colouring agent therapeutic agent photosensitivity disorder erythropoietic protoporphyria . Canthaxanthin retinopathy first described 1982 Cortin et al . In Germany office federal board health refuse permit oral tan agent contain canthaxanthine 1985 . At time long-term course disease know . 25 year later investigator long-term follow-up examination .
